text: Ojo kase, ki [dilas az cahlu sirk] murda ʙud va mo [ʙo tavhidu imon] zindaas gardonidem va nure ʙarojas padid ovardem, to dar partavi [hidojat] on mijoni mardum gom ʙardorad, hamcun kasest, ki gui dar torikiho [giriftor] ast va az on ʙerun omadani nest? On ci kofiron mekardand, in guna ʙarojason orosta sudaast
